title: Question 20:
description: How can I make a trade on Synthetix.Exchange?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: Go to [Synthetix.Exchange](https://synthetix.exchange) and press on trade on the header. You do need Synths to trade on the exchange, ideally sUSD, which you can acquire on centralised exchanges such as [Kucoin](https://kucoin.com) or [curve](https://www.curve.fi/susdv2/).
